Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to win the game for the New York Mets
Post-Match Reflections: Carlos Mendoza, the Mets manager, celebrated with his team and emphasized the importance of resiliency and having fun
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets will face the Philadelphia Phillies in the National League Division Series
Others: The Brewers' season ends in heartbreaking fashion
